name: Milk
name2: Milk | fresh and delicious | Rich in nutrient
description: A nutrient-rich milk produced by cow, providing essential proteins, fats, vitamins, and minerals, widely consumed for its health benefits and culinary versatility.

name: Bread
name2: Sliced Breads | soft to eat | Every bite is a delight
description: Made from refined wheat flour, often soft and light. Uses whole grain wheat flour, providing more fiber and nutrients.

name: Coconut oil
name2: Coconut oil | A Drops of Tropical Heaven
description: Common white table sugar, often derived from sugar cane or sugar beets.

name: Cookies
name2: Baked Cookies | Making Every Day More Of A Treat
description: Classic cookies with chocolate chips mixed into the dough. often decorated with icing or sprinkles.

name: Laundry detergent
name2: Liquid detergent | A Clean Start for Your Wardrobe
description: Dissolves easily in water, good for pre-treating stains and convenient for measuring. effective for heavy-duty cleaning and often more affordable.

name: Shampoo
name2: Hair shampoo | Making your hair silky smooth
description: Contains active ingredients to treat scalp conditions like dandruff, psoriasis, or dermatitis.  Lacks harsh sulfates, making it gentler on hair and scalp, suitable for sensitive skin or color-treated hair.

name: Tooth paste
name2: Tooth paste | Keep your teeth strong and healthy.
description: Formulated with mild abrasives or bleaching agents to remove surface stains and whiten teeth  and kid-friendly flavors to encourage proper brushing habits in children.
